Package com.vuzix.hud.actionmenu

Class SwitchActionMenuItemView

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.view.ViewGroup
android.widget.FrameLayout
com.vuzix.hud.actionmenu.SwitchActionMenuItemView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class SwitchActionMenuItemView extends android.widget.FrameLayout

FrameLayout with a switch enabled within

This is inspired from DefaultActionMenuItemView from HudActionMenu library. The only thing that's different is instead of an ImageView in the center of the ActionMenuItem, there is a Switch.

Since:
2019-02-27
